TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent

summary.span: 提供有关系统错误的信息。

span.span: Provides information about systemic errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 提供有关配置或应用程序代码问题导致的错误的信息。The provides information about errors caused by problems with configuration or application code. 例如，当在页面中找到错误时，ASP.NET 发出的错误。An example is the error issued by ASP.NET when an error is found in a page. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. 还显示了配置文件的节选，使 ASP.NET 可以使用此自定义事件。Also shown is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use this custom event. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview
